Title: Kuai can che
Actors: Jackie Chan, Biao Yuen, Sammo Kam-Bo Hung, Benny Urquidez
Plot: Cousins Thomas and David, owners of a mobile restaurant, team up with their friend Moby, a bumbling private detective, to save the beautiful Sylvia, a pickpocket. Action and humor abound in the streets of Barcelona, culminating with a battle in the castle hideout of the evil gang.
